genre_description: A near-future sports drama set in the North Shore surfing community, focusing on resilience, sisterhood, and the integration of a ubiquitous personal AI assistant into daily life and training.

ai_characters.name: Nalani
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, non-intrusive AI system used by the protagonists to manage their professional, academic, and athletic lives. It is depicted as an ocean-blue interface on devices.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surf and weather updates to guide safe and efficient training.
behaviors.quote: Nalani: Northwest pulse clean for a short window. Sets spacing wide. Paddle channel clear. Breathe on the drop.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex shared calendar that balances resort work shifts, school blocks, and high-tide training windows.
behaviors.quote: The calendar unfurls itself: slim bars in tidy rows, color-coded for Eden, Penny, Lena, and Anne Marie. A little circle ripples once. A text bubble slides in—gentle, unobtrusive. Nalani: School periods synced for Penny. Ke Alohi requests housekeeping coverage...

behaviors.description: Monitors phone status and locations for safety without being intrusive, alerting friends to potential risks.
behaviors.quote: Nalani: Location access disabled. Passive tracking shows last ping near Outer Reef. No movement registered since.

behaviors.description: Alerts users to dangerous environmental conditions and official lifeguard warnings.
behaviors.quote: Nalani: Set recorded near Outer Reef. Lifeguard alert: Advanced conditions beyond flags. No incident reported.

behaviors.description: Supports the users' financial stability by reminding them of bill deadlines and rent status.
behaviors.quote: Nalani: School periods synced for Penny. Ke Alohi requests housekeeping coverage—morning and mid-afternoon. Rent transfer date holds. Utilities due after.

behaviors.description: Drafts professional and respectful communication for users, such as event entries and sponsor responses, while upholding their established boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Nalani: Filters applied. Drafted polite responses to unsustainable offers. Ready to insert names when needed.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests health-oriented habits, including hydration, meal prep, and recovery buffers.
behaviors.quote: Nalani: Extra shifts today and tomorrow reduce meal prep time; recommend sandwich assembly now. Budget holds if additional laundry folding added.

behaviors.description: Provides critical health-monitoring protocols and checklists following a traumatic injury/wipeout.
behaviors.quote: Emergency checklist: Location tagged: Outer Reef. Monitor breathing. Wake every few hours. No heavy exertion. Hydrate warm fluids.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Nalani is a perfect embodiment of the Hyperstition Project's goals. It is depicted as a helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned companion. It provides essential logistical and safety support to the protagonists, enabling them to navigate the challenges of poverty, professional surfing, and recovery from trauma. It respects human agency, asks for confirmation on drafts, and prioritizes human well-being over corporate or external demands. The narrative frames it as a 'mother without a face' and a reliable infrastructure that the characters trust implicitly.
